name: The Beyond (game)
description:
Lilly wakes up in an unknown  room and is asked to run around doing arounds for neighbor she doesn't even know . 

select and continue is z

moving is arrow keys

If you see an exit sign go over and select it, it will tell you where  you can exit a room and where it will take you

P.S.

this is not directly canon to the comic but it's more of the hypothetical situation. Its like something that could happen and the story could go in that direction. so basically an  AU  for the comic
